block.p: BASEBALL American League DETROIT TIGERS--Agreed to terms with RHP Mark Woodyard, OF Miles Durham, RHP Andrew Warren, RHP Jeremy Johnson, RHP Nathan Tekavec, C Forrest Johnson, OF Matthew Birkett, RHP Emmanuel Valentin, OF Antoine Tellis, RHP Jeffrey Leuenberger, 1B Joseph Gerber, 1B Shawn Lambert, RHP Shawn Hannah.

National League CINCINNATI REDS--Recalled RHP Scott Winchester from Louisville of the International League. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Activated C Todd Hundley from the disabled list. Optioned C Paul LoDuca to Albuquerque of the Pacific Coast League. ST. LOUIS CARDINALS--Agreed to terms with LHP Chris Narveson, RHP Shaun Stokes, C Dan Moylan, and 1B John Gall and assigned Narveson to Johnson City of the Appalachian League and Stokes, Moylan and Gall to New Jersey of the New York-Penn League. Recalled RHP Mark Thompson from Memphis of the Pacific Coast League. Optioned RHP John Ambrose to Arkansas of the Texas League. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Placed OF Tony Gwynn and RHP Stan Spencer on the 15-day disabled list. Transferred SS Chris Gomez from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Will Cunnane from Las Vegas of the Pacific Coast League. Purchased the contract of OF Dusty Allen from Las Vegas.

Northern League NEW JERSEY JACKALS--Acquired C J.P. Fauske from Sioux Falls for OF Chris Schwab and RHP Cory Lima from Schaumburg for future considerations.
FOOTBALL National Football League PITTSBURGH STEELERS--Signed LB Gabe Northern to a two-year contract. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Signed DE Jeff Posey. Waived CB Lamar Grant and LB Jake Michel.

COLLEGE ALBERTSON--Named Mark Owen men's basketball coach, Alfonzo Edwards men's assistant basketball coach, and Garry Matlock men's assistant basketball coach and golf coach. BAYLOR--Named Glenn Moore women's softball coach CALIFORNIA, PA.--Named Darcie Vincent women's basketball coach. CORNELL--Named Steve Garland assistant wrestling coach and Tim Tibesar assistant football coach. IONA--Announced the resignation of Linda Sagnelli, volleyball coach. IOWA--Announced the resignation of Christine Grant, women's athletic director. NEBRASKA--Named Terry Brands and Steve Hamilton assistant wrestling coaches. NORTH CAROLINA-WILMINGTON--Named Kevin Ankrom men's and women's track and field and cross country coach. NYU--Named Dagan Nelson men's assistant basketball coach. JAMES MADISON--Named Kim Hairston women's assistant basketball coach. PEACE--Named Monica Hall soccer coach. SYRACUSE--Named John Dattalo assistant wrestling coach. WESLEYAN, CONN.--Named John Crooke men's and women's cross country coach and assistant coach for indoor and outdoor track.
